data.message: pretty sure Eminem is at a point in his career now where he cares less about the quantity of his fans compared to the quality. Not sure how someone would see what he did as an 'act' or part of some 'agenda'. That was clearly passion he was exuding.

replies.message: i dont think he cares about quility or he wouldnt be running them off
Quality? LOL Is there a difference in the money that lines the pockets of either side? Are the quality of bills somehow better in the pockets of Trump haters than supporters? ALL banks would say no.

Thats exactly the point.   The man's a mogel.  He will sell out every show no matter what he says or does.  For every fan he dumped he's earned 10 more.  Here at home and around the world.  He doesnt want trump supporting riff raff enjoying his art.  All these whining snowflake people doing the stalker ex like trump did after curry dissed him.
Either side is a $ symbol, you honestly think he gives a fuck about any fans?
Would have been better if he wore the pussy hat because he sound like shit.
